channel.title: 2 step crash
channel.description:
I'm going to make this as simple as possible. I open ANY client. I take 1 step. I take 2nd step it closes. Can you help me.
I would say that if i was a noob.
Since i'm a semi-noob i'm going to say this Any DOWNLOADED cleint i use crashes if i take two steps. the first step is fine though. If i use moparscape webclient i press log in and then nothing happens it just says Loading please wait.... SILAB is the only client that works. it only works on the webclient though not the downloded. oh just kidding AZN cheat client works too. nothing else

item.title: 2 step crash
item.dc:creator: @antdude antdude
item.description:
@antdude wrote:

it was the environment variables…classpath or path idk. but it also messed up my computer so i have to use system restore lol…it fixed all java related 2 action problemz but now i can’t go on cmd and type ‘ipconfg’ so i’m trying on anotehr computer and keeping the original thingz…thanks tho!

Read full topic

item.title: 2 step crash
item.dc:creator: @undertaxxx undertaxxx
item.description:
@undertaxxx wrote:

Reinstall Java, check your enviroment variables, recompile, see if that works

Try running stuff as ‘administrator’, also check windows firewall to see it it blocks the client from running

Read full topic
